content.en: Power Analysis Efficiency: Different approaches to standard differential power analysis attacks have essentially equivalent efficiency. Polar differential power attacks can successfully target a block cipher without knowledge of the cipher algorithm or implementation, but the biases of DPA peaks vary for different cryptographic algorithms and implementations. Leakage squeezing can improve the countermeasure against zero-offset second-order correlation power analysis attacks by reducing the dependency between the shares' leakage through manipulating the mask.
content.da: Effektivitet af Strømanalyse: Forskellige tilgange til standard differential power analysis-angreb har stort set samme effektivitet. Polære differential power-angreb kan med succes målrette en blokchiffer uden kendskab til chifferalgoritmen eller implementeringen, men DPA-spidsers skævheder varierer for forskellige kryptografialgoritmer og implementeringer. Lækagekompression kan forbedre modforanstaltningen mod nul-offset andenordens korrelations power-analyseangreb ved at reducere afhængigheden mellem delenes lækage gennem manipulation af masken.
